name: paper production, woodfree, coated, at non-integrated mill | paper, woodfree, coated | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7480/documentation

Wood free, coated paper (also called coated fine paper) is used for all kind of printing and other graphic purposes. Wood free paper is defined as containing at least 90% of the fibres in form of chemical pulp. Coated means that the paper is coated with a coating material like kaolin or calcium carbonate on one or two sides. This dataset represents the production at non-integrated mills which means that market pulp is bought as an input for paper production. ;;The main sources for the dataset are the Finnish EcoData database from KCL (KCL (2002)) as well as several CER‘s of integrated and non-integrated paper mills (Äänekoski (2001); Grycksbo (2002); Kangas (2001); Kymi (2001); Nordland Papier (2001); Oulu (2002); Uetersen (2001));;An additional source is the European IPPC documentation for the paper and pulp industry (European Commission (2000)).;;References ;Äänekoski (2001) EMAS statement 2000. M-real Paper, Äänekoski (Finland);;Grycksbo (2002) Environmental Report 2001. StoraEnso, Grycksbo (Sweden) as pdf-File under: http://www.storaenso.com/CDAvgn/main/0,,1_-2395-2103-,00.html;Kangas (2001) EMAS statement 2000. M-real Paper, Jyväskylä (Finland);;KCL (2002) KCL EcoData - life cycle inventory database. The Finnish Pulp and Paper Research Institute (KCL), Espoo (Finnland);Kymi (2001) Kymi Paper Oy Environmental Protection in 2000. UPM-Kymmene Kymi Paper Oy, Kuusankoski (Finland) as pdf-File under: http://www.paper.upm-kymmene.com;;Nordland Papier (2001) Umwelterklärung 2001. UPM-Kymmene Nordland Papier AG, Dörpen (Germany) as pdf-File under: http://www.paper.upm-kymmene.com;;Oulu (2002) Environmental Statement 2001. Stora Enso Oyj, Oulu (Finland) as pdf-File under: http://www.storaenso.com/CDAvgn/main/0,,1_-2393-2097-,00.html;;Uetersen (2001) Vereinfachte Umwelterklärung 2000. StoraEnso Uetersen GmbH, Uetersen (Germany) as pdf-File under: http://www.storaenso.com/CDAvgn/main/0,,1_-2394-2102-,00.html

This activity starts with the reception of the raw materials, such as sulfate market pulp.

This module includes the European production of coated woodfree paper in a non-integrated mill - including pulp preparation, paper production, energy production on-site and internal waste water treatment.
category: C:Manufacturing/17:Manufacture of paper and paper products/170:Manufacture of paper and paper products/1701:Manufacture of pulp, paper and paperboard

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data represent the average technology in the late 1990ies and early 2000s. The production volume is valid for  2018.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data from several European fine paper producers used as European average data.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Based on literature and statistics (see dataset field “Published Source”)
